title: When the dust settles = et la Poussiere retombe
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Louise Johnson and Barrie Angus McLean
brief_description: This delightful seven minute film is designed to entertain and educate children about effective ways to deal with conflict. The film conveys its message through neighbouring parties of gophers; one community is being harassed by another group of gophers thoughtlessly throwing dirt at their fellow creatures.
